original_text: Achish trusted David and said to himself, “He has become so obnoxious to his people, the Israelites, that he will be my servant for life.”
korean_text: 아기스가 다윗을 믿고 말하기를 다윗이 자기 백성 이스라엘에게 심히 미움을 받게 되었으니 그는 영원히 내 부하가 되리라고 생각하니라

sentences.original_text: "He has become so obnoxious to his people
that he will be my servant for life."
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 평생 나의 종이 될 것이다."
